Title: Authorizes the City of Newburgh to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy
Summary: Authorizes the City of Newburgh to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy in accordance with applicable law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing the city of Newburgh to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy in accordance with applicable law
